headline: Meet the Dow Jones Dividend Stock That Is Hovering Around an All-Time High Despite the Stock Market Sell-Off
summary: The stock market sell-off has intensified, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average and S&P 500 both down over 10% from their recent highs and the Nasdaq Composite down over 20% as of this writing-- putting the growth-heavy index in a bear market.  In fact, fast-food giant McDonald's (NYSE: MCD) hit an all-time high in March and is up slightly year-to-date at the time of this writing.  Here's why the Dow Jones component is well positioned to endure tariffs and why the dividend stock could be worth buying now.
